descriptionHtml:
*REQUIRES DAWNGUARD*

Krin the Vale Sabrecat can be found near the shed at Halfmoon mill (he likes to wander!). When dismissed he returns there, but can take a while since hes slow and likes to nap. ;p

 My second animal follower mod, made after Gaia the Vale Deer.

I\'ve noticed he does a bit of bobbing when standing up but I haven\'t seen a way to fix that yet.

Funfact: Krin is the Ta\'agra (the Khajiit language) word for grin/smile.
author: Stodd90
